original_text: Tell him that I will destroy the power of foreign kings. I will destroy their armies. Their horses and chariots will fall down. Their soldiers will fight against each other. They will kill each other with their swords.
korean_text: 여러 왕국들의 보좌를 엎을 것이요 여러 나라의 세력을 멸할 것이요 그 병거들과 그 탄 자를 엎드러뜨리리니 말과 그 탄 자가 각각 그의 동료의 칼에 엎드러지리라

sentences.original_text: Tell him that I will destroy the power of foreign kings
sentences.korean_translation: 그에게 이방 왕들의 권세를 내가 멸망시킬 것이라고 전하라

sentences.original_text: Their horses and chariots will fall down
Their soldiers will fight against each other
They will kill each other with their swords
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그들의 칼로 서로 죽일 것이다
